name: [PB053] Focal Point
info: made with LSDJ, released on PxlBot. this was while i still called myself VCMG, before i had to switch to a different name. tracklist: 1. Introduction [2xLSDJ] 2. Waking Up in the Perseids 3. Surmounting the Highest of Peaks 4. Warp Speed 5. Focal Point 6. New Beginnings Past Old Endings, or How I Learned to Love Life 7. Stars and Skies Forever 8. At Peace (Bonus Track)
